Those with gluten sensitivities can still enjoy Rumba Island Bar & Grill ? the menu includes a number of gluten-free options. Unwind with a glass of wine or cocktail with your meal ? this restaurant has a wonderful selection of drinks to accompany your dinner. Tots and tykes will be right at home at this restaurant with its kid-approved food and ambience. Rumba Island Bar & Grill is known for its happy hour, which includes food and beverages. Getting online is easy with Rumba Island Bar & Grill's free and convenient wifi. Outdoor seating is ready for diners on those warm summer days. Rumba Island Bar & Grill is well-known for being able to seat large parties. If your Friday or Saturday night plans include a trip to the restaurant, it's best to reserve a table before heading over. No need for a wardrobe change when you hit Rumba Island Bar & Grill ? it's strictly casual. With food this good, you'll be running into this restaurant to pick it up yourself. At Rumba Island Bar & Grill, drivers can take advantage of the nearby lot, which also provides valet service. Cyclists will also appreciate the plentiful space to lock up their bikes outside the restaurant. Rumba Island Bar & Grill knows how to put a smile on your face - the fairly-priced fare is easy on your taste buds as well as your wallet. The restaurant's dinner menu receives the most attention, though breakfast and lunch are also options.
